flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: First take you Plastick Box And drill holes all around at the top.Next Take The cap And Cut a hole A 1mm Smaler then the fan Next Use a ac adapter And wier everything up (you will see that the fan Hawe 3 wires The My hawe A gelow wire so i Glued The Yellow wire inside The Box At the bottom)Next Put ice in it And Power it.If you wont to be cooler freeze some shampoo:

guide.summary: Your gonna Nedd Fan.Plastick box With a cap And a ac Adapter.
guide.title: How to make a airconditioner
